item.title: Bird Museum
item.description: Introduction This is a 4 weeks task, we need to find a set of images and make an app for this image set focusing on Ui & UX. My image set is a collection of birds and I want to make a bird species guide from it. Brief A funnier bird species guide aims at encouraging people to know and explore more bird species. Users can view and recognize the birds thorough the sounds, location and drawing, besides that, users can also recognize the bird species by photos and add those bird species into their collection just like a bird version Pokémon Go.

item.title: Bother Sofa
item.description: .img-position{ box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); text-align: ; } Collaborator: Fora Form Introduction In this task, we can make a radical design for Fora Form Design Brief The backrest of Bother-Sofa is made of elastic rubber band and the user will feel the “wave” if another colleague joins of leave the set. Unlike normal office furniture which tries their best to avoid the influence between the colleagues, Bother-Sofa aims at making the colleagues to bother others when they sit or leave the sofa, encouraging them to talk, interactive with others and arouse their empathy through this “bothering experience”.

item.title: Solar Popcorn
item.description: .img-position{ box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); text-align: ; } Collaborator: Fora Form Introduction In this task, we can choose one of the Fora Form’s chair and make an incremental design for it. In this case, I chose the very classic popcorn chair. Design brief Solar popcorn is an incremental upgrading of the classic popcorn chair, it adopts thin-film solar panel as the backrest and sitting cushion of the chair to provide power for charging a cellphone.

item.title: Use fontawesome in markdown
item.description: .img-position{ box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); text-align: ; } 是否合适 尽管在markdown中使用fontawesome来添加小图标不太符合makrdown专注于内容而非形式的宗旨，并且在一些情况下这些小图标格式会有所改。但是，万一用的到呢 : ) 例如本站中的about页面，但本站使用hugo搭建，而直接在markdown中以html的形式使用fontawesome并不会在网页中渲染出来，但是将使用fontawesome的html语句写成shortcode并在markdown页面中使用则可行。 如何使用 首先一如既往的在markdown文件头部引入fontawesome库 <head> <script defer src="https://use.fontawesome.com/releases/v5.0.13/js/all.js"></script> <script defer src="https://use.fontawesome.com/releases/v5.0.13/js/v4-shims.js"></script> </head> 然后直接在markdown文档中使用 <i class="{{ index .Params 0 }}"></i> xxx

item.title: Life Wave
item.description: Design brief Information is the essence of life. This design focuses on propagating a certain kind of electromagnetic waves towards the universe which is based on the analysis of the DNA of the pets. As a result, the traces of the pets’ life can stay for a rather long time, or even forever. This way of handling the body of pets doesn’t occupy any physical space. This kind of electromagnetic waves can’t be touched or felt by human, however, they do exist.

item.title: Plantales
item.description: Design brief “Plantales” hope to create planting area for the elderly through overall arrangement of open space in the community, such as the roofs. We invite the elderly people to join us and divide them into groups. At the beginning, we will provide lectures，workshops and materials to teach them planting skills. Then there will be parent-child activities, cooperation with community kindergartens, and so on. After harvest, we will organize activities to distribute the vegetables to other lonely elderly in the communities.
